name: Spoon Bath Eventure
description:
Upon finding a mysterious creature with psychic powers in the storage closet of Mr Dude’s house, The Nays venture off to Psyciao World, where they go on a journey to find their friends and take the legendary spoon bath, which will grant them psychic powers. As friends face off against each other, they race to the top of the Lattice Tower, where the spoon bath lies. Only one Nay will be permitted to complete this ritual. But who will that be?

You can purchase this Eventure in book form here!
